Going to Town And Back to The Ranch - Effects
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Going to Town And Back to The Ranch - Effects
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, August 31, 2000 - 07:07 pm:

I'm in the middle of a combining project where I'm combining every week, so I'm also taking my monster to town every week. I freeze him then save, then test combos, reset, and take him back for another week. Of course, you get a 5 point loyalty boost each time you go to town and return, and your style moves toward strict. But what I did NOT know was that it DRASTICALLY increases stress! I was allowing my monster to work 2 Light Jobs, then rest, mostly to just get it over with quickly, and after 2 months of weekly trips to town, got a stress warning! So now, of course, I'm adding mint. Anyone with a method involving lots of freezing should compensate with extra mint

By Tony on Friday, September 1, 2000 - 04:15 am:

Yep, that's the case that Chase and I found on MR1 when he started his Vitamin D project on his Suezo's. Glad that part went out the window for MR2!!
